short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The most comfortable application for management bookmarks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Links Manager is a very fast organizer bookmarks in your Chrome browser.

Say good-bye to a huge number of tabs in your browser forever with our unique feature "STASH".

Links Manager synchronizes every change you make, and can be used on a wide range of devices and operating systems as well as with popular browsers via an extension.

◆  Functionality  ◆

-	Creating and updating bookmarks
-	Tabs templates for your current occupation
-	Storing and creating stashes with all closed tabs

◆  Updates  ◆

--- 0.0.2 ---
Fixed some bugs. Added markAll possibility to Bookmarks settings.

--- 0.0.1 ---
Release the first version. Waiting for your feedback to develop!
